pull.title: [test] combine_logs: append node stderr and stdout if it exists
pull.body:
See issue:

* tests: bitcoind stdout and error should be passed to the logger #13519

events.message: [test] combine_logs: append node stderr and stdout if it exists

events.body: See for example https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/521311218 where a node crashes(?) and the stderr is not accessible anymore on travis for debugging.
